title: 42: Episode #42: Three Wishes From Jo
itunes:title: Episode #42: Three Wishes From Jo
description:
• National Wear Your MuggleCast T-Shirt Day was a success!
  • June 7th is part two, and coincidentally Eric’s graduation day
  • We premiere Voice Rebuttals and go through our regular Listener Rebuttals
  • Why is Dumbledore’s office password protected?
  • In our latest Editorial segment, Laura and Micah talk to Robbie Fischer who runs The Book Trolley and The Magic Quill
  • This week’s Gimme a Butterbeer: Blame it all on Harry
  • What does a “No Comment” from Jo mean?
  • Who was at Godric’s Hollow that fateful night?
  • Could those who often use the phrase “silly girl” clue us in on who was there?
  • Why didn’t Voldemort use an Unbreakable Vow with his followers?
  • Is Colin Creevey’s camera electronic? Kevin puts the question to bed with his nerdy brilliance.
  • Chicken Soup for the MuggleCast Soul
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
